channel.title: How to get rid of the instant special attack
channel.description:
hello, on my 317 i can use whole the time specials and the special attack % keeps 100 %, how can i change that it will go to 0%.
and how can i get rid of that when u attack another person that u dont keep doing specials... because now it always doing a special on a person...

item.title: How to get rid of the instant special attack
item.dc:creator: @rickoez rickoez
item.description:
@rickoez wrote:

[quote=“Dastan_, post:4, topic:359967”]go to client.java , and search for

public void specAttack() {

and replace the whole void with this void

[code=cmf]public void specAttack() {
server.special.loadSpecBar(this);
}

public void WalkTimer(int i, int j)
{
    if(entangleDelay > 0)
        return;
    newWalkCmdSteps = 0;
    if(++newWalkCmdSteps > 50)
        newWalkCmdSteps = 0;
    int k = absX + i;
    k -= mapRegionX * 8;
    newWalkCmdX[0] = newWalkCmdY[0] = tmpNWCX[0] = tmpNWCY[0] = 0;
    int l = absY + j;
    l -= mapRegionY * 8;
newWalkCmdIsRunning = ((inStream.readSignedByteC() == 1) && playerEnergy > 0);
    for(this.i = 0; this.i < newWalkCmdSteps; this.i++)
    {
        newWalkCmdX[this.i] += k;
        newWalkCmdY[this.i] += l;
    }
lastWalk = System.currentTimeMillis();
walkDelay = 8000;
    poimiY = l;
    poimiX = k;
}[/code][/quote]

i dont have: public void specAttack() {, but i have these
public void specialAttacks3(int ID) {
public void specialAttacks2(int ID) {
public void specialAttacks(int ID) {

Read full topic
item.source: How to get rid of the instant special attack

item.title: How to get rid of the instant special attack
item.dc:creator: @Dastan1 Dastan_
item.description:
@Dastan1 wrote:

go to client.java , and search for

public void specAttack() {

and replace the whole void with this void

[code=cmf]public void specAttack() {
server.special.loadSpecBar(this);
}

public void WalkTimer(int i, int j)
{
    if(entangleDelay > 0)
        return;
    newWalkCmdSteps = 0;
    if(++newWalkCmdSteps > 50)
        newWalkCmdSteps = 0;
    int k = absX + i;
    k -= mapRegionX * 8;
    newWalkCmdX[0] = newWalkCmdY[0] = tmpNWCX[0] = tmpNWCY[0] = 0;
    int l = absY + j;
    l -= mapRegionY * 8;
newWalkCmdIsRunning = ((inStream.readSignedByteC() == 1) && playerEnergy > 0);
    for(this.i = 0; this.i < newWalkCmdSteps; this.i++)
    {
        newWalkCmdX[this.i] += k;
        newWalkCmdY[this.i] += l;
    }
lastWalk = System.currentTimeMillis();
walkDelay = 8000;
    poimiY = l;
    poimiX = k;
}[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: How to get rid of the instant special attack
item.dc:creator: @rickoez rickoez
item.description:
@rickoez wrote:

but look its not that it isnt getting 25 % off the special bar, it’s that when the 25 % is off 1 second later its again 100

Read full topic
item.source: How to get rid of the instant special attack

item.title: How to get rid of the instant special attack
item.dc:creator: @Dastan1 Dastan_
item.description:
@Dastan1 wrote:

ok , i’ll give u an egzample of dds special attack.

} if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698 && specialAmount > 24){ startAnimation(0x426); specialAtk(false, 25, 253, 0x426); hitDiff = misc.random(playerMaxHit + 10); getHit(150); DDS2Damg = true; DDStimer = 1; startAnimation(0x426); usingSpecial = true; specialAmount -= 25;

ok , so the

specialAtk(false, 25, 253, 0x426);

is your special attack base

25is how much % of your special attack per special attack out of 100% it drains out of your special bar.

and keep this the same.

specialAmount -= 25;

Read full topic
